roleset.name: examine closely, close examination

example.name: investigate a person
example.text: Mr. Antar is being investigated by a federal grand jury in Newark, where prosecutors have told him that they may soon seek an indictment on racketeering and securities fraud charges.
example.arg: by a federal grand jury in Newark, where prosecutors have told him that they may soon seek an indictment on racketeering and securities fraud charges.

example.name: investigate an SBAR
example.text: In another setback yesterday, United's machinist union asked the Treasury Department to investigate whether certain aspects of the original buy-out proposal violated tax laws.
example.arg: whether certain aspects of the original buy-out proposal violated tax laws.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Prosecutors in Taitung have been investigating county councilors for alleged corruption involving public grants and construction projects , and after half a year of the investigation 19 representatives have been indicted , including the current speaker and deputy speaker of the county council , along with 41 members of the previous two sessions of the council .
example.arg: for alleged corruption involving public grants and construction projects

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: McCarthy began his investigation of the Army Signal Corps Laboratory at Fort Monmouth, New Jersey in 1953.
example.arg: of the Army Signal Corps Laboratory at Fort Monmouth, New Jersey

example.name: all args
example.text: their investigation of the scene for physical evidence

roleset.note: INVESTIGATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls investigate-35.4, sight-30.2. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from investigate.01-v)
INVESTIGATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on investigate-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls sight-30.2, investigate-35.4. (from investigation.01-n)
